metadata.synopsis: One liner for an alarmed customer constantly moving around the shop.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to S_LOW_Client_007, will be moving around the shop. (CTY_Main_A aprox -16; 26; -84)

0.speaker: Big Clive
0.text: Excuse me, can't stop - there's only so much shopping time left before the Absolute breaches the city.

1.speaker: Big Clive
1.text: Did I not tell you I was busy? If I have to hole up in my basement without my favourite parchment, I'll go spare!
